products.title: Minimalist Coffee Table
products.description: A sleek, wooden coffee table that complements any living space. Lightweight, durable, and perfect for morning coffee or evening chats.

products.title: Modern Bookshelf
products.description: Keep your books and decor organized with this stylish 5-tier modern bookshelf. Crafted from engineered wood with a matte finish.

products.title: Velvet Armchair
products.description: Luxurious velvet armchair in emerald green. Cozy seating with plush cushions and sleek black legs for a classy lounge corner.

products.title: Glass Coffee Table
products.description: A round glass-top coffee table with metallic legs. Elegant and space-saving—ideal for small apartments or minimalist spaces.

products.title: Teal Fabric Sofa
products.description: Brighten up your living room with this 3-seater teal sofa. Comfortable cushions and a sturdy wooden frame for everyday lounging.

products.title: Scandinavian TV Stand
products.description: Scandi-style TV stand with open shelves and hidden drawers. Perfect for decluttering your entertainment space with a clean look.

products.title: Recliner Chair
products.description: Comfort meets function with this reclining armchair. Push-back mechanism and high-density foam for movie nights or naps.

products.title: Rustic Center Table
products.description: Rustic wood center table with metal legs. Adds a cozy, vintage vibe to any lounge space. Great for books, trays, or snacks.

products.title: Leather Ottoman
products.description: Multipurpose ottoman made with premium leather. Can be used as a footrest, extra seat, or compact coffee table.

products.title: Abstract Wall Art Set
products.description: Set of 3 abstract canvas prints to elevate your walls. Bold colors and brush strokes to add character to any living room.

products.title: Tufted Loveseat
products.description: A compact tufted loveseat with soft cushions and a modern silhouette. Perfect for cozy corners or small living rooms.

products.title: Round Side Table
products.description: Compact round side table made from walnut wood. Stylish and functional for placing lamps, plants, or coffee mugs.

products.title: Linen Floor Cushion
products.description: Oversized floor cushion made of soft linen with a tufted design. Great for relaxed seating or a boho-chic vibe.

products.title: Rustic Display Cabinet
products.description: Showcase your decor with this rustic display cabinet featuring glass doors and ample shelving space.

products.title: Modern Floor Lamp
products.description: Elegant arc floor lamp with a warm glow. Sleek and adjustable—perfect for reading corners or ambient lighting.

products.title: Patterned Area Rug
products.description: Add warmth and texture with this handwoven area rug in neutral tones and geometric patterns.

products.title: Nested Table Set
products.description: A space-saving solution—this 2-piece nested table set fits into modern or traditional interiors effortlessly.

products.title: Wall-Mounted Shelf
products.description: Floating wall shelf with a minimal design. Ideal for books, plants, or decor accents in the living room.

products.title: Convertible Sofa Bed
products.description: Stylish and versatile sofa that transforms into a bed. Great for guests or studio apartments with limited space.

products.title: Curved Lounge Chair
products.description: Chic and modern curved lounge chair with velvet upholstery and golden legs. Makes a bold statement in any living room.
